It is interesting that the paper looks like a dealer's paper and there is no
actual discussion of the tsuba anywhere on the page. Looks like someone
scamming. It is not even that good of a tsuba. I am not familiar with this
maker, perhaps Jim can shed some light on that.

 

Gordon
